data.name: CYBERUSH
data.detailed_description:
Rush through floors of a building on the way to get your revenge on the Boss up top in this fast-paced VR shooter!
------------------------
CHOOSE YOUR CLASS
PUNK - Go even faster as you spring and spring through your foes!
CORP - Pick up cash and have your ai assistant play the markets to get even more money!
BOUNCER - Outlast your opponents, take more hits and stand firm in your battles!
MERC - A real crack-shot, make your shots hurt and blow them all away!
------------------------
PRIMARY WEAPONS
-SHOTTY
-SIX-SHOOTER
-PLASMA BLADE
------------------------
SECONDARY ITEMS
-SPRAY PAINT
-BAT
-GRAPPLER
-TASER

data.short_description: Rush through floors of a building on the way to get your revenge on the Boss up top in this fast-paced VR shooter! Choose from four different classes as you swing, blast and slash your way through CYBERUSH!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 4590 Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: r9 480
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
